data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Bahawalpur to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,125 believers in Bahawalpur to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 2,125 believers living in Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan has a population of 762,200.

We estimate Bahawalpur has 2,125 people who might know Jesus, 7,622 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 752,453 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
